## Type of Change

- [ ] Bug fix (non-breaking change that fixes an issue)
- [ ] New feature (non-breaking change that adds functionality)

## Checklist
<!-- Verify before requesting review -->
- [ ] I tested my changes locally (`python scripts/<script>.py`)
- [ ] I ran the linter (`flake8 scripts/ tests/`)
- [ ] I ran the tests (`pytest tests/`)
- [ ] I checked for security issues (`bandit -r scripts/`)
- [ ] My changes don't break existing functionality
- [ ] I updated the README if needed
